htmlContent:
USSR gains 1 VP for each of the following countries he controls:

Egypt, Iran, Libya, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Gulf States, and Venezuela.

Unplayable as an event if ‘North Sea Oil’ is in effect.
name: OPEC
plainContent:
USSR gains 1 VP for each of the following countries he controls:
Egypt, Iran, Libya, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Gulf States, and Venezuela.
Unplayable as an event if ‘North Sea Oil’ is in effect.
